frontPage.title: This is a kickass yet simple website built in under 10 minutes
frontPage.content: There isn't much about building a multilingual website using Sibyl. Just create simple HTML pages and translation files, and Sibyl does all the heavy-lifting for you.

frontPage.title: Save time by building less HTML
frontPage.content: Create reusable components with associated CSS and HTML. Stop using styles.css as a file for every style in your document and place styles where they make sense and where they're used, and let Sibyl decide when they should be imported.

frontPage.title: Teamwork with better code
frontPage.content: Translations live in json files. HTML lives in page files. Page designers can work at the same as translators and copywriters, because everything is where it belongs.

frontPage.title: Sensible almost universal defaults
frontPage.content: We won't promise our defaults work for every project, but they'll surely work for most. Build your own design using our non opinionated defaults.

frontPage.title: Freaking fast webpages with minimal hosting costs
frontPage.content: All this allows Sibyl's webpages to be the fastest. Everything is statically served, which means you can maximize speed and serve your contents from a CDN like CloudFront.

frontPage.title: As close to the original as possible
frontPage.content: Input your old HTML or export Sibyl code to your application's language. Since Sibyl is as close to raw HTML as possible, this transition should be fast and painless.
